summary: As a part of their study of the Holocaust, the children of the Whitwell, TN Middle School try to collect 6 million paper clips representing the 6 million Jews killed by the Nazis, and grows to include millions of others killed.
cast: Tom Bosley|Casey Condra|Cassie Crabtree|Rachel Gleitman|Mary Jane Higdon|Linda Hooper|Bernard Igielski|George Jacobs|Sheila Levine|Sandra Roberts|Peter Schroeder|Dagmar Schroeder-Hildebrand|Drew Shadrick|Samuel Sitko|David Smith
title: Paper Clips
